## Calculator.removeRate() method

Remove a rate from a value

**Signature:**

```typescript
static removeRate(value: number, rate: number): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | number | Base value to raise |
|  rate | number | Rate value to apply |

**Returns:**

number


## Example

We want to remove a VAT rate (20%) from a price (12â‚¬)

```
// Prints "10":
console.log(Calculator.removeRate(12, 20));
```
